title: Come check our r/loreofleague!

embed.description: r/loreofleague: A space to post and discuss lore of our favorite champs, the world they live in, their storylines and conflicts, their struggles and ...

body: Hey there! I want to show off a subreddit exclusively dedicated to the lore of league of legends and runeterra (plus other future games riot makes) that supports old and new reddit. It has reddits voting system, flairs (looking for suggestions for more!) and right now a lax rule system, as long as you are not a jerk to others. There is also a Discord connected to the subreddit. Feel free to post your media, fanfiction or other stuff there!

replies.body:

Hey Odin, you should also **really** start using Discord *laughs nervously*. Not sure if you are familiar with the platform, but maybe it would be good, you know... you know....
Yeah, I'll try to make some time in following week or so.  (I'm in a crunch this week)

It was me. I stickied this.
At least for a little while.
Doing God's work!
Come join the Discord, full of smart people here. Also I talk about Morgana a lot. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Morgana? What happened to your Syndra obsession?
Oh Syndra's still there, but I'm waiting for more content to start my rampage again... :')

# **_*~~Friendship~~*_** *ended* with ~~Syndra~~

# Now _***~~Morgana~~***_ is his _new_ best friend!

Yesss join us... >:3c
